Welcome to Lead‑ing — leadership for young people that’s continuous and practical. This page is your fast‑track.

Who this is for

  • Students leading clubs or projects
  • First‑time team leads
  • Early‑career interns and grads
  • Anyone leading without a title

Read these first

  1. Influence Without a Title
  2. First 90 Days (New Role / Term)
  3. Peer One‑on‑Ones

How to use Lead‑ing

  • Pick one playbook, run it this week.
  • Use the toolkit to keep notes, plans, and feedback.
  • Practice with the scenarios when conversations get tough.
